titleStmt.title: The Kings bath Affording many sweet and comfortable obseruations from the baptisme of Christ. Gathered by Thomas Taylor, preacher of the word of God at Redding in Barkshire.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, Thomas, 1576-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Thomas Man, and Iohn Bartlet, and are to be sold at the signe of the Talbot in Pater-noster Row,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Talbot in Pater-noster Row
